channel.title: Too much damage!
channel.description: Hi, im here to say something about the NPCs on my server, when i hit higher and higher (level up more) so does the NPC. I need to fix this, because now, im hitting 247!! And a simple Tyras Guard is hitting 135!!! Is there any way to fix this so people dont get killed when they are 2 seconds into combat? I tryed changing stuff in config.cfg, but it didnt help... i just want normal hits like tyras guards max hits are something like 20 (normalish) and someone with 80 strength hits 25 with a dragon scimitar (very normal, if its a special attack...) please help? :confused: :confused: :confused: Thanks! Also, whatever command i type in, weather ::barrows (gives you full barrows, you didnt need to know that...) or not ::barrows, it gives me it anyway! I made a command called ::cash and when i type it in, it gives me ::barrows, ::cannon (fixed device) and ::dragon (full dragon) and then it just says "not enough space in inventory" like 100 times, so i suppose it goes through all the commands and adds all the items from all of the commands in the game into one jumble pack thing...? can someone help?! i need heeeeeelp! :(

item.title: Too much damage!
item.dc:creator: @zolly zolly
item.description:
@zolly wrote:

[quote=“pkinnubpk, post:4, topic:221497”]Its in npc.cfg it should look like this: //----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat–health, change the last one (health)[/quote] yeah, but a man (level 2) has 7 hp but it takes about 5000 hits to kill it (all them hits are like 40) and it says its HP is 7… what do i change it to? 1 less or something?

Read full topic

item.title: Too much damage!
item.dc:creator: @zolly zolly
item.description:
@zolly wrote:

Hi, im here to say something about the NPCs on my server, when i hit higher and higher (level up more) so does the NPC. I need to fix this, because now, im hitting 247!! And a simple Tyras Guard is hitting 135!!! Is there any way to fix this so people dont get killed when they are 2 seconds into combat? I tryed changing stuff in config.cfg, but it didnt help… i just want normal hits like tyras guards max hits are something like 20 (normalish) and someone with 80 strength hits 25 with a dragon scimitar (very normal, if its a special attack…) please help? Thanks! Also, whatever command i type in, weather ::barrows (gives you full barrows, you didnt need to know that…) or not ::barrows, it gives me it anyway! I made a command called ::cash and when i type it in, it gives me ::barrows, ::cannon (fixed device) and ::dragon (full dragon) and then it just says “not enough space in inventory” like 100 times, so i suppose it goes through all the commands and adds all the items from all of the commands in the game into one jumble pack thing…? can someone help?! i need heeeeeelp!

Read full topic
